{"id":205704132,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 10 months","timestamp":1549277285,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/205704132/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"966.7 KB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int d;\n     void dfs(vector<vector<int>> &grid,int i,int j){\n        if(i>=0 && i<grid.size() && j>=0 && j<grid[0].size() && grid[i][j]==1){\n            grid[i][j]=0;\n            d++;\n            dfs(grid,i-1,j);\n            dfs(grid,i+1,j);\n            dfs(grid,i,j-1);\n            dfs(grid,i,j+1);\n            //dfs(grid,i,j-1);\n        }\n    }\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int m=0;\n        for(auto i=0;i<grid.size();i++){\n            for(auto j=0;j<grid[0].size();j++){\n                d=0;\n                if(grid[i][j]==1) {\n                    dfs(grid,i,j);\n                    m=max(m,d);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return m;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
